price: মোৰ বান্দাসকলক জনাই দিয়া যে, নিশ্চয় মই অতি ক্ষমাশীল, পৰম দয়ালু,
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
